description: The observable behavior of the Microsoft Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) being updated automatically as part of the latest Cumulative Update indicates that systems utilizing Windows 11 version 22H2 and 23H2 for x64-based and arm64 architectures may not need manual intervention. This automation strives to enhance system recovery capabilities, streamlining the update process for users. As detailed in CVE-2024-20666, these updates are critical for maintaining the integrity and reliability of recovery procedures within the Windows environment.
